content.description: SDS on the southwest corner. Move up and left traversing on small holds. Key foot placement is the hardest part through here. Get a nice hold about 3 moves in. Follow the small seam up and into the other problem on this block. Small holds and quite a long problem for the area.
content.protection: crash pads great landing had to clear a bunch of downed trees.

pathTokens: Land Of The Way Too High Boulders, The

content.description: I have information on this boulder but don't have a name for it. I don't believe BK told me one but I'm sure he will chime in if he recalls one. Obvious Pyramid shaped boulder just to the south of The Land of The Way Too Highs proper. The block originally had one crack line feature going up at an angle to jugs on its Southface. will post a photo soon
